title: Zeity Night, Keep Your Trendhole Tight 6/16: Ivory Hecker, GOP, NBA, Putin, Jared Kushner
itunes:title: Zeity Night, Keep Your Trendhole Tight 6/16: Ivory Hecker, GOP, NBA, Putin, Jared Kushner
description:
On this edition of Zeity Night, Keep Your Trendhole Tight Jack and Miles discuss Ivory Hecker removing muzzle; placing foot resolutely in mouth, the GOP staying consistently inconsistent, NBA News, Putin Getting ETHERED by Rachel Scott, and "Living Ken Doll" Jared Kushner's book deal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
